name: college-ai-voice-agent
description: AI Voice Agent College Enquiry System

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "API,UI" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev:force --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "API,UI" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm start --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
